name: Viruzz
description:
Avoid the virus haunting the Forcol Museum to get you. Do not let infected people to touch you and wisely use healing kit bombs to hold out against the virus.

This game started as a local multiplayer idea, but due to time we had to scale it down to a quick single player (unfinished) experience.

Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018, in Bari, Italy.

Controls
Directional Keys to move Player

C to Hold Healing Bomb
Space to Drop Bomb
